Articles.Content:
welcome to corrupt a wish! so what is corrupt a wish? it is when one person wishes for something to be changed in the game for their own advantage such as

"I wish that Nuclears had a thrust of 500"

then next person to post would then "corrupt" the wish such as:

"Granted but Nuclears have a ISP of 20"

then they would wish for something them selves and the cycle continues! I hope people have fun with this thread!

so let me start it off I wish Eve had the same amount of Gravity as Gilly

Granted. Eve now has the atmosphere of Gilly.

I wish that plane changes were automatic.

I wish Eve had the same amount of Gravity as Gilly

Granted, but as Eve gets dug out from inside to reduce its mass, the mass accumulates at its surface, so its rotational speed reaches x-times the orbital velocity at sea level.

I wish Kerbin had more variable terrain scatter.

Edit: On second thought, I got it wrong and was a few seconds late - I rest my case and head ...

Edited February 3, 2014 by KerbMav

Granted. It's all over KSC. They also gave it collision meshes. Trees on the launchpad now blow up your rocket when you launch.

I wish we had more engines.

I wish we had more engines.

Granted. But now the engine mods are useless.

I wish we had complicated resources to mine.

Granted. But now the engine mods are useless.

I wish we had complicated resources to mine.

Granted, but it takes 7 different resources in strange ratios just to make kerosene.

I wish for the old .18 resource tree.

This one:

Guys, forum games (unsurprisingly) go in the Forum Games! section. (Moved.)

However. This game already exists --> http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/9423-Make-a-wish-and-have-it-horribly-corrupted%21

As such, thread closed -- please take it over to the other thread, folks.
